citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:41am-11:21am
on 09/25/25. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by calling the phone numbers listed on the
account. No contact was made and a voicemail was left. An attempted inspection leave behind flyer was left on the door.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.38(b)  Repeat
   
Miscellaneous. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:41am-11:21am 
on 09/25/25. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by calling the phone numbers listed on the 
account. No contact was made and a voicemail was left. An attempted inspection leave behind flyer was left on the door.  
 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
